definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Sterling silver and diamond pave crescent moons that can be added to hoop earrings of your choice.
sentences.chinese: 純銀與鑽石鑲嵌的新月可以加添在你鐵環狀耳環上。

sentences.english: For by me thy days shall be multiplied, and the years of thy life shall be increased.
sentences.chinese: 你藉着我，日子必增多，年歲也必加添。

sentences.english: We don't need props anymore to make us feel good about ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我們不再需要額外加添什麼，使我們對自己感覺良好。

sentences.english: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.
sentences.chinese: 有一位天使，從天上顯現，加添他的力量。

sentences.english: Go back to Christ and he would fill them again.
sentences.chinese: 他們只可以走到基督面前，請祂再加添食物。

sentences.english: 43An angel from heaven appeared to him and strengthened him.
sentences.chinese: 有一位天使從天上顯現，加添他的力量。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
to pray on behalf of sb
